title: 你的中文课进展得如何了

conversations.english: How are your Chinese lessons going?
conversations.chinese: 你的中文课进展得如何了？
conversations.reply_english: Oh I’m learning very slowly. I think Chinese is more difficult than English.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我学的非常慢。我觉得中文比英文要难学。

title: 你选的哪门课排第一位

conversations.english: Oh. Have you finisherd listing your study preferences?
conversations.chinese: 你选完了是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I have.
conversations.reply_chinese: 选完了．

title: 如何使用图书馆

conversations.english: Good morning, Miss.
conversations.chinese: 早上好，小姐。
conversations.reply_english: Morning. Can I help you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好。我可以帮你吗？

title: 地理作业晚交了

conversations.english: What's this then?
conversations.chinese: 那这个是什么？
conversations.reply_english: It's my geography, sir.The Map of Africa you set us.
conversations.reply_chinese: 老师，这是我的地理作业。你布置给我们的非洲地图。

title: 找一些论文的材料

conversations.english: Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: I hope so.I'm looking for some material for a paper I'm writing, and I'm not quite sure where to look.
conversations.reply_chinese: 希望如此。我在找写论文的一些材料，我不太清楚去哪里找。

title: 掷硬币决定谁睡下铺吧 Bottom bunk

conversations.english: Alright, we need to have a plan here. First of all, which bed do you want?
conversations.chinese: 好吧，我们需要有个计划。首先，你要哪一张床？
conversations.reply_english: Well, everybody wants the bottom bunk. Why don't we flip a coin for it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，每个人都想要下铺。我们何不掷硬币来决定呢？

title: 我不去上他的课了 I quit

conversations.english: I didn't see you at Mr. Johnson's class today.
conversations.chinese: 今天约翰逊先生的课上我没见到你。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I quit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，我不上了。

title: 我要在那家公司努力工作

conversations.english: I'm going to work in a multi-national enterprise after graduation.
conversations.chinese: 毕业之后我会到一家跨国公司工作.
conversations.reply_english: But you said your dream was to be an entrepreneur, to be your own boss.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可是你说过你想成为一名企业家,当自己的老板.

title: 老师我没听清楚

conversations.english: The answer for number 6 is C, 7 is B, 8 is A...
conversations.chinese: 第六题的答案是C，第七题是B，第八题是A......
conversations.reply_english: Ms. Lee, could you tell me what number 7 is again? I didn't catch you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 李老师，您能再说一遍第七题是什么吗？我没听清楚。

title: 我正在研究非洲不同部落的语言

conversations.english: So , how's your course going? Do you like it?
conversations.chinese: 嗨,上课怎么样?你喜欢吗?
conversations.reply_english: I like my professors and the classes, but it's a lot of work.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢我的教授们和班里的同学,可作业实在是太多了.

title: 不过我不知道应该上哪所学校

conversations.english: Did you go to university?
conversations.chinese: 你上过大学吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I graguated with a BA in English from Qingdao Uinversity.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,我是青岛大学英语专业的学士.

title: 上学第一天怎么样

conversations.english: Hey! How was your first day of class? I’m in level two and I’m loving my class this semester! It’s great being in a class of international students!
conversations.chinese: 嘿！上学第一天怎么样？我在第2年级，我喜欢这学期的课。在一个满是国际生的班级中感觉很棒。
conversations.reply_english: Mine was ok, except that no one in my class speaks English. I guess it will force me to converse in Chinese more in class so at least I should improve a lot this semester.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我还可以，就是班里没人说英语。我想那会迫使我在课堂上多用中文交流，至少这学期我会大幅度提高中文水平。

title: 你决定下一个学期要修什么课程了吗 Study plan

conversations.english: Have you decided what you are going to take next semester?
conversations.chinese: 你决定下一个学期要修什么了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I'm an English major, you know.So I came here to make sure I'm taking the right things.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我的主修是英文。所以我要确定我修的课是正确的。

title: 我需要一份推荐书来申请奖学金 Scholarship

conversations.english: How can I help you today, Alice?
conversations.chinese: 我今天能帮你些什么，艾丽斯？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I came to talk to you because I want to apply for a scholarship.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我来是因为我想申请奖学金。

title: 申请课程的截止日期已经过去了

conversations.english: Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes.I am interested in applying for graduate school here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我很想申请这里的研究生院。

title: 考试分数Our test grades

conversations.english: I hope the teacher decides to curve our test grades.
conversations.chinese: 我希望老师决定把考试成绩按比例加分。
conversations.reply_english: I wouldn't count on it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不会寄予期望的。

title: 我们每三个月打扫一次宿舍

conversations.english: Would you like to go skating with me this afternoon?
conversations.chinese: 今天下午你想和我一起去溜冰吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I'd love to. But we're going to clean our dormitory. I can't be absent.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我很乐意去。但是我们要打扫宿舍。我不能缺席。

title: 你的新宿舍怎么样啊

conversations.english: How is your new dormitory?
conversations.chinese: 你的新宿舍怎样？
conversations.reply_english: It's very nice. There are only four people, and those girls are very kind and friendly.
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常好。宿舍里有四个人，那些女孩都非常善良、友好。

title: 我可以问个问题吗

conversations.english: May I ask a question?
conversations.chinese: 我可以问个问题吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,what's it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以，什么问题？

title: 你的作业写得也太乱了 Too messy

conversations.english: Bill,your work is too messy.
conversations.chinese: 比尔，你的作业太乱。
conversations.reply_english: I'll pay attention to my handwriting next time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 下次我会注意书写的。

title: 能借我纸笔用用吗 Making requests

conversations.english: Hey, Ann. You don't have a pen, do you?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，Ann，请问你有笔吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, here you go.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，拿去吧。

title: 这份兼职可帮助提高我的英语水平

conversations.english: Hey, This is your order.
conversations.chinese: 嗨。这就是您点的东西。
conversations.reply_english: Are you new here? I come to this coffeehouse often. But I didn't see you here before.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是这里新来的吗？我经常到这家咖啡厅来。但是我以前都没有在这里见过你。

title: 大部分学生在考试前一个月开始复习

conversations.english: Are these your text books? Biochemistry, General Ecology, Botany, Cell Genetics, Molecular Genetics…
conversations.chinese: 这些是你的课本吗？生物化学、生态学概论、植物学、细胞遗传学、分子遗传学……
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I gotta review all of them for the final exam. It is just around the corner.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，为了期末考试，我得把它们全部复习一遍。马上就要期末考试了。

title: 哪个班的篮球队赢了比赛

conversations.english: You look hot and tired. Jack, have you been exercising?
conversations.chinese: 你看上去又累又热，杰克。你去锻炼了吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. We just had a basketball match with Class Two.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我们刚跟二班进行了篮球比赛。

title: 这次的考试恐怕我没有考好

conversations.english: What do you think of the test?
conversations.chinese: 你认为这次考试怎样？
conversations.reply_english: Rather difficult. How about you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 很难的，你呢？

title: 谢谢你帮我复习并鼓励我全力以赴

conversations.english: you look better today. How did your test go?
conversations.chinese: 你今天看起来好多了.你的测验怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: much better than it did yesterday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 比昨天好多了!

title: 你毕业后有什么打算吗 Plan for the future

conversations.english: You'll soon graduate from your university. Do you have any plans for the future?
conversations.chinese: 你就快大学毕业了.对未来有什么打算吗?
conversations.reply_english: I'm planning to go to graduate school, but I also want to find a job. Otherwise, I'll have nowhere to go if I fail the entrance exam.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想读研究生,还想找工作,不然如果没考上就没出路了.

title: 钢琴课开课啦 Learn piano

conversations.english: Hi Cody, how did practicing go this week?
conversations.chinese: 你好，Cody，练得怎么样了？
conversations.reply_english: Well I had several tests and an oral presentation this week so I didn’t get a chance to memorize the second page, but I think I mastered the tricky section.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这周我参加了几个考试以及口头陈述，所以我没有机会记住第2页，但是我想我掌握了棘手的部分。

title: 我们得为学校募捐活动筹集够足够的钱

conversations.english: OK Mark, it’s your turn to ring the doorbell. I did it last time.
conversations.chinese: 好吧，Mark，轮到你去按门铃了，上次是我按的。
conversations.reply_english: I hate going door to door, and I hate asking for money.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我讨厌挨家挨户得按门铃，我讨厌借钱。

title: 我这周一直在红十字会学习急救课程

conversations.english: Hey，Joe! Where have you been these past few days?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，乔，这些天你去哪里了？
conversations.reply_english: I’ve been busy with a first aid course that I started about a week ago at the Red Cross.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一直忙于一周前在红十字会那里开始学的急救课程。

title: 心肺复苏法课程开课了 CPR course

conversations.english: Hello everyone,and welcome to our CPR for beginners course.First of all, does anyone know what CPR stands for?
conversations.chinese: 大家好，欢迎来到为初学者开设的CPR课程。首先，有谁知道CPR是什么意思？
conversations.reply_english: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation!
conversations.reply_chinese: 心肺复苏法。

title: 我想需要申请一张校园内的停车许可证

conversations.english: Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 我能帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I need to apply for a parking permit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我需要申请一张停车许可证。

title: 或许你可以在中国城找到一份兼职

conversations.english: I don't know what I'm going to do.I need to find a job. If I don't, I won't be able to stay here next semester.
conversations.chinese: 我不知道如何是好。我需要找一个工作。如果我找不到，下个学期就没有办法留在这里。
conversations.reply_english: Have you tried university part-time jobs?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你试过大学的兼职工作吗？

title: 你了解爆奇卡的功能吗 Bucky Card

conversations.english: Excuse me. Do you have a minute?I'd like to tell you about the Bucky Card.
conversations.chinese: 抱歉。你有时间吗？我想告诉你有关爆奇卡的事。
conversations.reply_english: Well... alright. I guess I have a minute.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯……好吧，我想我是有一点时间。

title: 这回的测验我考砸了 Do poorly

conversations.english: You know... I did very poorly on that test.
conversations.chinese: 你知道的，那次测验我考砸了。
conversations.reply_english: Cheer up! It's not the only chance in life to do well on a test. There'll be many more.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别泄气！又不是一辈子只有一次机会考试得好成绩。以后还有嘛。

title: 你介意我坐在这里吗

conversations.english: Do you mind if I sit here?
conversations.chinese: 你介不介意我坐在这里？
conversations.reply_english: Of course not, help yourself.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，你请坐吧。

title: 或许你该跟老师谈谈

conversations.english: Maybe you should talk to the teacher.
conversations.chinese: 或许你该跟老师谈谈。
conversations.reply_english: No, it's no use.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，那没用。

title: 我正在考虑申请哪一所学校

conversations.english: I’m trying to decide what school to apply for.
conversations.chinese: 我在考虑申请哪一所学校。
conversations.reply_english: Are you thinking about a public school or a private one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是上公立学校还是私立学校？

title: 听说18世纪诗歌这门课很难

conversations.english: What’s your schedule like this year?
conversations.chinese: 你今年的课程表进度怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Pretty busy. I have to pick up a lot of credits this year.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很紧。我今年要修很多学分。

title: 你可以帮我搜索诺曼底登陆的资料吗

conversations.english: Can you help me do an internet search?
conversations.chinese: 你可以帮我在网上搜索一下吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. What do you want to find?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以！你想找什么？

title: 宿管来查房啦 What are you doing here

conversations.english: Who is it?
conversations.chinese: 是谁？
conversations.reply_english: Supervisor. Open the door.
conversations.reply_chinese: 宿管。开门。

title: 这学期你们有几门专业课几门选修课

conversations.english: How many courses do you have for this semester?
conversations.chinese: 这学期你们上几门课？
conversations.reply_english: Eight altogether.
conversations.reply_chinese: 总共八门。

title: 我还自以为考得不错呢

conversations.english: You'll have to take a make-up exam in logic.
conversations.chinese: 你逻辑学要补考。
conversations.reply_english: Oh,I thought I did a good job.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是吗，我以为我考得不错呢。

title: 我必须回家读书

conversations.english: I've got to go home and study.
conversations.chinese: 我必须回家读书。
conversations.reply_english: For what?
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么？

title: 这所学校有八成学生是黑人

conversations.english: Hey, Wen! Welcome to D.C.! Glad you came out to visit!
conversations.chinese: 嗨，小雯！欢迎来到哥伦比亚特区！真高兴你来这里玩！
conversations.reply_english: Thanks for inviting me. Actually, I've never been anywhere with so many black people before. It's different.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你邀请我来。老实说，我从没到过黑人这么多的地方！感觉截然不同。

title: 你的大学生活过得怎么样

conversations.english: Hey, Jordan, is that you? Long time no see!
conversations.chinese: 嘿，乔丹，是你吗？好久不见！
conversations.reply_english: Oh, hey, no kidding! I haven't seen you since orientation three months ago! So how've you been? Settling into college life OK?
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，嘿，真的是这样啊！自从上次分开我们已经有三个月没见了！你现在好吗？开始你的大学生活了吗？

title: 我想要注册下学期的课程 Registering

conversations.english: Excuse me? Is this where I register? I’d like to sign up for my courses for next semester.
conversations.chinese: 打扰下，请问这里是登记处吗？我想要注册下学期的课程。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, of course. I need your student ID please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。我需要你的学生号。

title: 你最喜欢的课程是哪门

conversations.english: School has added several new courses to our grade this semester. I have more homework to do now.
conversations.chinese: 这个学期学校给我们年级又加了几门课。现在我有更多的家庭作业要做了。
conversations.reply_english: What's your favorite course, Daniel?
conversations.reply_chinese: 丹尼尔，你最喜欢的课程是哪门啊？

title: 选学校是件很头痛的事 Too many options

conversations.english: How is the college search going?
conversations.chinese: 学校找得怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: It's a huge headache. I have no idea what I want to do.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是件很头痛的事。我不知道我想干什么。

title: 大学课堂Class

conversations.english: May, could you bring this note to Professor Li for me today?
conversations.chinese: 阿美，今天你能帮我把这张便条带给李教授吗
conversations.reply_english: Sure, no problem. Asking for leave again? You have been absent from class five times this semester.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，没有问题。又要请假？这个学期你已经请了五次假了。

title: 同学交流Student's Communications

conversations.reply_english: Hi, this is Maria. Is that Shirley?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我是玛丽亚。你是雪莉吗？

title: 校园夜生活 School Night Life

conversations.english: So what do you feel like doing this evening? How about going to the cinema?
conversations.chinese: 你今天晚上想干什么呢？去看电影怎么样啊？
conversations.reply_english: Ah, that's a good idea. But I heard the film club of our school would show a film for free. Maybe we don't need to go to the cinema.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是个不错的主意。我听说我们学校的电影俱乐部会免费放映电影。或许我们不用去电影院。

title: 谈论老师 Talking about the teachers

conversations.english: There are lots of new teachers in our class this semester.
conversations.chinese: 这学期我们班来了很多新老师。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, so what do you think about the teachers?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，你认为这些老师怎么样？

title: 后勤服务Rear Services

conversations.english: Have we handed out all the water?
conversations.chinese: 我们发完所有的水了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. So what else to do now?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。那我们现在还有别的事要做吗？

title: 住校生活Campus Life

conversations.english: Daniel, would you like to have a look at my dorm?
conversations.chinese: 丹尼尔，想不想去看看我的寝室？
conversations.reply_english: Of course, I'd like to.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，我很想去。
